eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A CIVIL EMERGENCY MESSAGE FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Adams, NE; AT 04:58 PM ON NOV 17, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 05:43 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: The Anhydrous Leak at 4900 J Street has been resolved The Anhydrous Leak at 4900 J Street has been resolved.  Crews are finishing up clearing the scene.  There may be some residual odor, but it is safe to return normal activities
